tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE legislative_bills (
    bill_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    bill_title VARCHAR(255),
    amendment_id INT,
    amendment_description TEXT,
    amendment_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE bill_history (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  bill_id INT,
  amendment_id INT,
  amendment_date DATE,
  amendment_description TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE bills (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  bill_number VARCHAR(20),
  bill_title TEXT,
  bill_sponsor VARCHAR(50),
  introduction_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE amendments (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  amendment_number INT,
  amendment_text TEXT,
  amendment_author VARCHAR(50),
  amendment_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE legislative_bills (
  bill_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  bill_title VARCHAR(255),
  amendment_history JSON
)

CREATE TABLE legislators (
  legislator_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  legislator_name VARCHAR(255),
  party_affiliation VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE bill_categories (
  category_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  category_name VARCHAR(100)
)

CREATE TABLE amendments (
  amendment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  amendment_description TEXT,
  amendment_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE Amendments (
    amendment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    bill_id INT,
    amendment_text TEXT,
    date_proposed DATE,
    author_id INT
);
